channel.title: branching on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in branching on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcBFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc28037 Gene Symbol: AcBFT2 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: CRISPR-Cas9-mediated mutagenesis of kiwifruit BFT genes results in an evergrowing but not early flowering phenotype.

item.title: BdCAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g06480 Gene Symbol: BdCAD1 Gene Name: cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Disrupting the cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 gene (BdCAD1) leads to altered lignification and improved saccharification in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BEI;SBE1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g51084 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0726400 Gene Symbol: BEI SBE1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnFAX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC05G0364600WE Gene Symbol: BnFAX6 Gene Name: Fatty Acid Export 6 Genome: ZS11 reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Fatty acid export protein BnFAX6 functions in lipid synthesis and axillary bud growth in Brassica napus.

item.title: CaBLIND
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaBLIND|CaBL Gene Name: BLIND Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaBLIND|CaBL regulates axillary meristem initiation and transition to flowering in pepper.

item.title: CsAGL16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G048150 Gene Symbol: CsAGL16 Gene Name: AGAMOUS-LIKE 16 Genome: Cucurbitaceae genome database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The AGAMOUS-LIKE 16–GENERAL REGULATORY FACTOR 1 module regulates axillary bud outgrowth via catabolism of abscisic acid in cucumber.

item.title: CsBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G020890 Gene Symbol: CsBRC1 Gene Name: cucumber BRANCHED1 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBRC1 inhibits axillary bud outgrowth by directly repressing the auxin efflux carrier CsPIN3 in cucumber.

item.title: CsRAV1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRAV1 Gene Name: Related to ABI3 and Viviparous 1 Genome: Species: Castanea sativa Functional Descriptions: CsRAV1 induces sylleptic branching in hybrid poplar.

item.title: CsTL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G003590 Gene Symbol: CsTL Gene Name: tendril-less Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Map-based cloning identified the mutated gene, CsaV3_3G003590, which we designated as CsTL, which is homologous to Arabidopsis thaliana LATERAL SUPPRESSOR (AtLAS).

item.title: Dt2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18g273600 Gene Symbol: Dt2 Gene Name: Determinancy gene 2 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Further analyses determine that Dt2 is the corresponding gene and the natural variations in Dt2 result in significant differential transcriptional levels between the two major haplotypes.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g52280 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0612700 Gene Symbol: FC1 OsCAD7 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FveFT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g09870 Gene Symbol: FveFT3 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GmDT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G273600 Gene Symbol: GmDT2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation in Dt2 predominantly determines soybean branching.

item.title: GmSPL9d

item.title: MtLUX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtLUX Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: In vivo and in vitro experiments showed that MtLUX directly binds to a cis-element in the promoter of MtTB1/MtTCP1A, suggesting that MtLUX regulates branching by rhythmically suppressing MtTB1/MtTCP1A.

item.title: MtNFH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g116990.1 Gene Symbol: MtNFH1|MtChit5 Gene Name: NOD FACTOR HYDROLASE1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Role of the Nod Factor Hydrolase MtNFH1|MtChit5 in Regulating Nod Factor Levels during Rhizobial Infection and in Mature Nodules of Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtROP9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtROP9 Gene Name: small G-protein ROP9 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Silencing of the Rac1 GTPase MtROP9 in Medicago truncatula Stimulates Early Mycorrhizal and Oomycete Root Colonizations But Negatively Affects Rhizobial Infection.
